dashboard.title: File Manager
dashboard.dropzone: Click or drag files here to upload

config.title: R2 Configuration
config.subtitle: Configure your Cloudflare R2 bucket information
config.importConfirm: Are you sure you want to import {{count}} configurations? Existing ones will be overwritten.
config.syncConfirm: This will attempt to sync current configurations to the cloud. Note: if environment variables are configured, cloud sync might be read-only. Continue?
config.restoreConfirm: Found cloud configurations with {{count}} items. Are you sure you want to restore and overwrite current local configurations?
config.noCloudConfig: No valid configuration list found in the cloud.

welcome.title: Welcome to Prism R2
welcome.desc1: Your all-in-one Cloudflare R2 storage management tool, built for the ultimate experience.
welcome.desc2: Supports custom endpoints and CORS protection. Your credentials stay in your browser.
welcome.desc3: iOS-style glassmorphism design with multipart upload, instant preview, and bulk management.
welcome.desc4: Full support for custom domains. Generate CDN links directly from your R2 bucket.

auth.unauthorized: Your account is not authorized to access this system. Please contact the administrator.

auth.feature2Desc: Local storage for configs, no backend processing
